trans-unit.source: Cloud App Discovery Registry Settings for Proxy Services
trans-unit.target: Cloud App Discovery Registry Settings for Proxy Services

trans-unit.source: The objective of this topic is to provide you with the steps you need to perform to set the required port on the computers running the Cloud App Discovery agent.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this topic is to provide you with the steps you need to perform to set the required port on the computers running the Cloud App Discovery agent.

trans-unit.source: Cloud App Discovery Registry Settings for Proxy Services
trans-unit.target: Cloud App Discovery Registry Settings for Proxy Services

trans-unit.source: By default, the Cloud App Discovery agent is configured to use only the ports 80 or 443.
trans-unit.target: By default, the Cloud App Discovery agent is configured to use only the ports 80 or 443.

trans-unit.source: If you are planning on installing Cloud App Discovery in an environment with a proxy server that is using a custom port (neither 80 nor 443), you need to configure your agents to use this port.
trans-unit.target: If you are planning on installing Cloud App Discovery in an environment with a proxy server that is using a custom port (neither 80 nor 443), you need to configure your agents to use this port.

trans-unit.source: The configuration is based on a registry key.
trans-unit.target: The configuration is based on a registry key.

trans-unit.source: The objective of this topic is to provide you with the steps you need to perform to set the required port on the computers running the Cloud App Discovery agent.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this topic is to provide you with the steps you need to perform to set the required port on the computers running the Cloud App Discovery agent.

trans-unit.source: To modify the port used by the computer running the Cloud App Discovery agent, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To modify the port used by the computer running the Cloud App Discovery agent, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Start the registry editor.
trans-unit.target: Start the registry editor.

trans-unit.source: Run
trans-unit.target: Run

trans-unit.source: Navigate to or create the following registry key:
trans-unit.target: Navigate to or create the following registry key:

trans-unit.source: **HKLM_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Cloud App Discovery\Endpoint**
trans-unit.target: **HKLM_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Cloud App Discovery\Endpoint**

trans-unit.source: Create a new **multi-string** value called **Ports**.
trans-unit.target: Create a new **multi-string** value called **Ports**.

trans-unit.source: ![New](./media/active-directory-cloudappdiscovery-registry-settings-for-proxy-services/proxy02.png)
trans-unit.target: ![New](./media/active-directory-cloudappdiscovery-registry-settings-for-proxy-services/proxy02.png)

trans-unit.source: To open the **Edit Multi-String** dialog, double-click the Ports value.
trans-unit.target: To open the **Edit Multi-String** dialog, double-click the Ports value.

trans-unit.source: In the Value data textbox, type the following values and add all custom ports that are used by your organization:
trans-unit.target: In the Value data textbox, type the following values and add all custom ports that are used by your organization:

trans-unit.source: ![Edit Multi-String](./media/active-directory-cloudappdiscovery-registry-settings-for-proxy-services/proxy03.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Edit Multi-String](./media/active-directory-cloudappdiscovery-registry-settings-for-proxy-services/proxy03.png)

trans-unit.source: Click **OK** to close the **Edit Multi-String** dialog.
trans-unit.target: Click **OK** to close the **Edit Multi-String** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Additional Resources
trans-unit.target: Additional Resources

trans-unit.source: How can I discover unsanctioned cloud apps that are used within my organization
trans-unit.target: How can I discover unsanctioned cloud apps that are used within my organization

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
